title: Unable to connect to chat, you may reconnect manually.
body: Does anybody know how to fix that. Its been saying that for the past week and Ive tried many youtube vids and they didn't work. I also Deleted my game and redo loaded it and it still didn't work.

replies.body:
This is often caused by your local network blocking access to specific ports that the chat service needs access through. Working through our [**network configuration guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should assist you in resolving this.

Let me know if this helped.
